song.englishname: To You We Bring Our Hymn Of Praise (Glory Be To God)

english.segment1: Glory be to God. Hearts and hands together raised glory be to God
english.segment2: Who spoke before the dawn of time glory be to God. Veil of darkness torn by light glory be to God
english.segment3: And with unceasing voice all heaven sings. Glory be to God. The anthem of the Lord's redeemed. Glory be to God
english.segment4: You purchased captives for Your saints glory be to God. And opened wide the kingdom gates glory be to God
english.segment5: You overcame the sting of death glory be to God. And clothed us in Christ's righteousness glory be to God
english.segment6: And all Your children cry with loud acclaim. Glory be to God. Sing O church Your sweet refrain. Glory be to God
english.segment7: Glory glory glory glory forever and ever. Glory glory glory glory forever and ever
english.segment8: Father Spirit risen Son glory be to God. Who was and is and is to come glory be to God
